about_the_game:
This morning you spotted a stranger heading into the forest behind your home.

Curious, you stalked them all the way to the lake— an odd place to be at this time of year. It's too cold to swim, but too early in the season to risk walking across the ice...

You found them gliding gracefully across the frozen surface on a pair of razor-sharp skates. You held your tongue even as the ice began to crack beneath them...

Meanwhile, your bratty foxboy friend is waiting for you to come home. He brought groceries— like he does every Tuesday— and he isn't leaving without a 'thank you'.

Features

  • Choose who you want to hang out with each day

  • Replay scenes from the event menu

  • Unlock secret scenes

  • Get different endings based on your choices

content_descriptors.notes:
* All characters depicted are 21 years old or older

This game features scenes of:
 
- Masturbation, blowjobs, gay sex, etc
- Alcohol usage
- Crossdressing
- Dubious consent

detailed_description:
This morning you spotted a stranger heading into the forest behind your home.

Curious, you stalked them all the way to the lake— an odd place to be at this time of year. It's too cold to swim, but too early in the season to risk walking across the ice...

You found them gliding gracefully across the frozen surface on a pair of razor-sharp skates. You held your tongue even as the ice began to crack beneath them...

Meanwhile, your bratty foxboy friend is waiting for you to come home. He brought groceries— like he does every Tuesday— and he isn't leaving without a 'thank you'.

Features

  • Choose who you want to hang out with each day

  • Replay scenes from the event menu

  • Unlock secret scenes

  • Get different endings based on your choices

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Femboy Propaganda

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A cute sandbox visual novel where you have to choose between a foxboy and a bunnyboy.
